title: Design of a Large-Scale Integrated E-Learning-Based Distance Mathematics Education System

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of college-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra)
context.additional_context: Environment promoting peer collaboration and self-directed learning through simultaneous real-time online lectures and offline discussions using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interaction of e-learning system components (instructional design, technology, teaching, and learning)
Learners can apply methods to effectively design and deliver mathematics content in blended environments
Learners enhance problem-solving skills by conducting peer reviews using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
